title: Authors and Citation
text: Gillespie C, Owen J (2025). rtypeform: Interface 'typeform' Results. R package version 2.1.1, http://csgillespie.github.io/rtypeform/, https://github.com/csgillespie/rtypeform.
code: @Manual{,   title = {rtypeform: Interface to 'typeform' Results},   author = {Colin Gillespie and Jamie Owen},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 2.1.1, http://csgillespie.github.io/rtypeform/},   url = {https://github.com/csgillespie/rtypeform}, }

title: Interface to typeform Results
text: Typeform company specializes online form building. R package allows users download form results exposed API (V2).

title: Interface to typeform Results
text: package can installed CRAN loaded usual way.

title: Interface to typeform Results
text: package can used either typeform personal access token setting application creating OAuth access token. personal access token gives full access typeform API typeforms results. Note anyone personal access token can retrieve, update delete typeforms data. access typeform data personal access token see Personal Access Token section . creating application OAuth access token, explicit permission different functionality (scopes) must granted. See section OAuth access. previously used version 1 API now entirely removed. need generate new tokens.

title: Interface to typeform Results
text: use package personal access token need first obtain one. fairly easy obtain one. See typeform’s help page. token look something like 943af478d3ff3d4d760020c11af102b79c440513

title: Interface to typeform Results
text: create application authenticates using OAuth use scopes define extent access users data. way app can request users permission undertake actions users behalf. link get started registering new application account. client id client secret can use {rtypeform} package set options. personal access token. Anyone details can impersonate obtain, update remove data, always kept safe. set client id secret, can obtain access token also need define scope application. rtypeform_set_scope() takes argument character vector allowed access scopes. information see scopes section . can generate new token open web browser prompting user give permission. token can cached local .httr-oauth file sessions.

title: Interface to typeform Results
text: define scope time access token generated. discover scope allows access , see .

title: Interface to typeform Results
text: key, (either personal access token, oauth token created make_new_token()) can extract data typeform forms object also contains attributes containing total number forms. don’t pass api token argument, attempt read variable typeform_api2 .Renviron file, via Sys.getenv("typeform_api2"). variable set correctly, can omit api argument set access token current session can use set (see Efficient R programming Chapter 2 details). can download data particular typeform via object q list. first element meta contain details user, , platform user_agent. list elements responses question. number options downloading data. example See ?get_responses help page options.
code: api = "XXXXX" # Was get_typeforms() in V1 of the package forms = get_forms(api) attr(forms, "total_items") #> [1] 476 # See ?get_forms for further details forms = get_forms() rtypeform_set_token(api) # Most recent typeform form_id = forms$form_id[1] q = get_responses(form_id, completed = TRUE) q = get_responses(form_id, completed = TRUE, page_size = 100)

title: Interface to typeform Results
text: Since responses list, get perform lots map operations. find using {purrr} {tidyverse} make bit easier. see question types can use string map() commands together
code: library("tidyverse") question_types = q[-1] %>% # Remove the meta    map(~select(.x, type)) %>%    map_df(~slice(.x, 1)) %>%    pull()

title: Interface to typeform Results
text: Imagine want: completed results, add parameter completed = TRUE. maximum 5 results, add parameter page_size = 5. results since 2018-01-01 11:00:00.
code: since = "2018-01-01 11:00:00" # convert to date-time since = lubridate::ymd_hms(since) q = get_responses(form_id, completed = TRUE,                   page_size = 5, since = since)

title: Interface to typeform Results
text: suggestions find bugs, please use github issue tracker. Feel free submit pull requests. Development package supported Jumping Rivers

title: Theme functions — create_theme
code: create_theme(   name,   api = NULL,   background_href = NULL,   background_layout = "fullscreen",   background_brightness = 0,   colors_answer = "#4FB0AE",   colors_background = "#FFFFFF",   colors_button = "#4FB0AE",   colors_question = "#3D3D3D",   font = "Source Sans Pro",   has_transparent_button = TRUE )  get_theme(theme_id, api = NULL)  get_themes(api = NULL, page = 1, page_size = 10)  update_theme(   theme_id,   name,   api = NULL,   background_href = NULL,   background_layout = "fullscreen",   background_brightness = 0,   colors_answer = "#4FB0AE",   colors_background = "#FFFFFF",   colors_button = "#4FB0AE",   colors_question = "#3D3D3D",   font = "Source Sans Pro",   has_transparent_button = TRUE )  delete_theme(theme_id, api = NULL)

title: Theme functions — create_theme
text: name See https://www.typeform.com/developers/create/reference/create-theme/ api Default NULL. private api key. api NULL, environment variable Sys.getenv("typeform_api2") used. background_href See https://www.typeform.com/developers/create/reference/create-theme/ background_layout See https://www.typeform.com/developers/create/reference/create-theme/ background_brightness See https://www.typeform.com/developers/create/reference/create-theme/ colors_answer See https://www.typeform.com/developers/create/reference/create-theme/ colors_background See https://www.typeform.com/developers/create/reference/create-theme/ colors_button See https://www.typeform.com/developers/create/reference/create-theme/ colors_question See https://www.typeform.com/developers/create/reference/create-theme/ font See https://www.typeform.com/developers/create/reference/create-theme/ has_transparent_button See https://www.typeform.com/developers/create/reference/create-theme/ theme_id theme id page page results retrieve. Default 1 first page results. page_size Number results retrieve per page. Default 10. Maximum 200.

title: Fetch all available typeforms — get_number_of_forms
code: get_number_of_forms(api = NULL, search = "", workspace_id = NULL)  get_forms(   api = NULL,   page = 1,   page_size = 10,   search = "",   workspace_id = NULL )

title: Fetch all available typeforms — get_number_of_forms
text: api Default NULL. private api key. api NULL, environment variable Sys.getenv("typeform_api") used. search Returns items contain specified string. workspace_id Retrieve typeforms specified workspace. page page results retrieve. Default 1 first page results. page_size Number results retrieve per page. Default 10. Maximum 200.

title: Download questionnaire results — get_responses
text: Download results particular typeform questionnaire.

title: Download questionnaire results — get_responses
code: get_responses(   form_id,   api = NULL,   page_size = 25,   since = NULL,   until = NULL,   after = NULL,   before = NULL,   completed = NULL,   query = NULL,   fields = NULL )

title: Download questionnaire results — get_responses
text: form_id form id typeform want results . api Default NULL. private api key. api NULL, environment variable Sys.getenv("typeform_api2") used. page_size Maximum number responses. Default value 25. Maximum value 1000. since default NULL. Fetch results specific date time. NULL return results. date time object. timezone object converted UTC. default NULL. Similar since. default NULL. Fetch results specific date time. NULL return results. use parameter, responses sorted order system processed (instead default order, submitted_at). ensures can traverse complete set responses without repeating entries. default NULL. Similar completed default NULL, return results. Fetch completed results (TRUE), -completed results (=FALSE). NULL return results. Warning. possible determine completed/non-completed results. query Limit request responses include specified term. fields implemented. Pull requests welcome

title: Download questionnaire results — get_responses
text: list. first value meta information. Subsequent elements questions..

title: Available workspaces — get_number_of_workspace
code: get_number_of_workspace(api = NULL, search = NULL)  get_workspaces(api = NULL, search = NULL, page = 1, page_size = 10)  create_workspace(workspace_name, api = NULL)  get_workspace(workspace_id, api = NULL)  update_workspace(   workspace_id,   api = NULL,   workspace_name = NULL,   add_members = NULL,   remove_members = NULL )  delete_workspace(workspace_id, api = NULL)

title: Available workspaces — get_number_of_workspace
text: api Default NULL. private api key. api NULL, environment variable Sys.getenv("typeform_api2") used. search Returns items contain specified string. page page results retrieve. Default 1 first page results. page_size Number results retrieve per page. Default 10. Maximum 200. workspace_name name workspace name workspace_id Retrieve typeforms specified workspace. add_members Email address remove_members Email address

text: Create token object using client id secret options set, together defined scopes.

title: Post response — post_response

what: Set access scopes for OAuth access — rtypeform_set_scope
title: Set access scopes for OAuth access — rtypeform_set_scope
text: Define access scopes application. See https://www.typeform.com/developers/get-started/scopes/ information scopes allowed permissions. Set option rtypeform client id, secret

title: Set access scopes for OAuth access — rtypeform_set_scope
code: rtypeform_set_scope(scopes = NULL)  rtypeform_set_client_id(id = NULL)  rtypeform_set_client_secret(secret = NULL)  rtypeform_set_token(token)

title: Set access scopes for OAuth access — rtypeform_set_scope
text: scopes character vector scopes id client id typeform registered application secret client secret typeform registered application token Either string personal access token, OAuth token returned make_new_token.

title: Set access scopes for OAuth access — rtypeform_set_scope
rtypeform 2.1.1 2022-12-22
text: chore: Cleaning, linting, & namespacing fix: Update typeform URLs

title: rtypeform 2.1.0 2020-08-29
text: CRAN release: 2020-08-31 CRAN release

title: rtypeform 2.0.3 2020-08-28
text: Fixed issue introduced dplyr 1.0.0 handling duplicate variable names

title: rtypeform 2.0.1
text: CRAN release: 2020-03-23 Tidying code Update docs Use Oauth

title: rtypeform 2.0.0
text: CRAN release: 2018-08-28 Move new typeform API - breaking changes Jumped Version 2 match V2 API.

title: rtypeform 0.4.0
text: CRAN release: 2018-07-27 Bug fix: Empty data frames now returned Intended final version using V1 data API. Added start-message. Removed offset argument - seems broken typeform end.

title: rtypeform 0.3.3
text: CRAN release: 2017-12-02 consistent response get_typeforms(). Bug fix: Return empty data frame typeforms (edge case). Bug fix: typeform API insists integers times; use times.

title: rtypeform 0.3.2
text: CRAN release: 2017-10-02 Bug fix: Return empty data frame completed responses. Bug fix: Parse hidden fields correctly

title: rtypeform 0.3.1
text: CRAN release: 2017-07-25 Improved error messages http status codes. consistent response get_questionnaire().

title: rtypeform 0.3.0
text: CRAN release: 2017-05-03 Breaking changes API. get_results() now depreciated. Instead, use get_questionnaire(). returns list http_status, question stats, questions, completed, uncompleted responses (thanks @hrbrmstr).

title: rtypeform 0.2.1
text: Adding automatic type conversion get_results() function (thanks @1beb).

title: rtypeform 0.2.0
text: CRAN release: 2016-12-02 Adding user agent API call. Better error handling. Export get_api function.

title: rtypeform 0.1.1
text: CRAN release: 2016-03-31 Minor tweaks CRAN.

title: rtypeform 0.1.0
text: Initial release.
